title: You Understand, but Not Really
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Really, Honoka is a troublesome girl. Kotori is too nice to her. So I have to be strict whenever I can<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>….Fufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ayumu? ….Why are you smiling like that….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I just thought you really do love Honoka-chan and Kotori-chan huh~, Umi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeh!? How did you come into that conclusion from what I just said!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Because you looked really happy, Umi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Uu…. That’s not….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Childhood friends are really something else, huh. You’ve known them since you’re little, so you kind of understand everything about them, but at the same time, not really….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….You’re right. There’s always a new surprise. That’s why you want to always keep them close and in touch<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Umi-chan, let’s hold our childhood friends dear to us, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
